dcmExportPriorsRule.description: Export Priors Rules applied to DICOM objects received by any AE. May be supplemented by configured Export Priors Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmMPPSForwardRule.title: MPPS Forward Rule
dcmMPPSForwardRule.description: MPPS Forward Rules applied to MPPS received by any AE. May be supplemented by configured MPPS Forward Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmRSForwardRule.title: RESTful Forward Rule
dcmRSForwardRule.description: RESTful Forward Rules. May be supplemented by configured RESTful Forward Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmArchiveCompressionRule.title: Compression rule
dcmArchiveCompressionRule.description: Compression rules applied to DICOM objects received by any AE. May be supplemented by configured Compression Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmArchiveAttributeCoercion.title: Attribute Coercion (Legacy)
dcmArchiveAttributeCoercion.description: Attribute Coercion applied to DIMSE received/sent by any AE. May be supplemented by configured Attribute Coercions for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmArchiveAttributeCoercion2.title: Attribute Coercion (New)
dcmArchiveAttributeCoercion2.description: Attribute Coercion applied to DIMSE received/sent by any AE. May be supplemented by configured Attribute Coercions for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmRejectionNote.title: Rejection Note
dcmRejectionNote.description: Specifies behavior on Rejection Note Stored

dcmStudyRetentionPolicy.title: Study Retention Policy
dcmStudyRetentionPolicy.description: Study Retention Policies applied to Studies received by any AE. May be supplemented by configured Study Retention Policies for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmStoreAccessControlIDRule.title: Store Access Control Rules
dcmStoreAccessControlIDRule.description: Store Access Control Rules applied to Studies received by any AE. May be supplemented by configured Store Access Control Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

dcmUPSOnStore.title: UPS on Store Rules
dcmUPSOnStore.description: UPS on Store Rules applied to DICOM objects received by any AE. May be supplemented by configured UPS on Store Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

hl7UPSOnHL7.title: UPS on HL7 Rules
hl7UPSOnHL7.description: UPS on HL7 Rules applied to HL7 messages received by any HL7 Application. May be supplemented by configured UPS on HL7 Rules for particular HL7 Applications.

dcmUPSOnUPSCompleted.title: UPS on UPS Completed Rules
dcmUPSOnUPSCompleted.description: UPS on UPS Completed Rules applied to UPS managed by any AE. May be supplemented by configured UPS on Store Rules for particular Archive Network AEs.

hl7ForwardRule.title: HL7 Forward Rule
hl7ForwardRule.description: HL7 Forward Rules for HL7 messages received by any HL7 Application. May be supplemented by configured HL7 Forward Rules for particular HL7 Applications.

hl7ExportRule.title: HL7 Export Rule
hl7ExportRule.description: Export Rules applied to HL7 messages received by any HL7 Application. May be supplemented by configured HL7 Export Rules for particular HL7 Application.

hl7PrefetchRule.title: HL7 Prefetch Rule
hl7PrefetchRule.description: HL7 Prefetch Rules applied to HL7 messages received by any HL7 Application. May be supplemented by configured HL7 Prefetch Rules for particular HL7 Application.

hl7StudyRetentionPolicy.title: HL7 Study Retention Policy
hl7StudyRetentionPolicy.description: HL7 Study Retention Policies triggered by HL7 messages received by any HL7 Application. May be supplemented by configured Study Retention Policies for particular HL7 Applications.

hl7OrderScheduledStation.title: Scheduled Station for HL7 Order
hl7OrderScheduledStation.description: Scheduled Station selected on MWL HL7 Order Feed received by any HL7 Application. May be supplemented by configured values for particular HL7 Applications.

hl7OrderSPSStatus.title: SPS Status for HL7 Order
hl7OrderSPSStatus.description: Specifies SPS Status of DICOM MWL items created/updated on received HL7 ORM^O01, OMI^O23, OMG^O19 messages. May be overwritten by configured values for particular Archive HL7 Application.

dcmXRoadProperty.title: X-Road Property
dcmXRoadProperty.description: Properties for accessing Estonian National Patient Registry in format <name>=<value>

dcmImpaxReportProperty.title: Impax Report Property
dcmImpaxReportProperty.description: Properties for accessing Agfa Impax Report Service in format <name>=<value>
